= Details =
To change the header, meta tags, site keywords:

   1. Go to example.com/data
   2. Edit the file header.inc.php
   3. Edit the following lines:

<code><TITLE><?php echo $title?> @BookintheBible</TITLE></code>
<code><meta name="author" content="Jason Jersey / Qorporate LLC"></code>
<code><meta name="copyright" content="2010 Qorporate LLC"></code>
<code><meta name="email" content="op@qorporate.com"></code>
<code><meta name="Rating" content="General"></code>
<code><meta name="Distribution" content="Global"></code>
<code><meta name="Robots" content="INDEX,FOLLOW"></code>


To change the footer, includes bottom links:

   1. Go to example.com/data
   2. Edit the file footer.inc.php


To change the sites header title:

   1. Go to example.com/data
   2. Edit the file template.inc.php
   3. Edit the following lines:

<code>$template['searchForm1']['StartHTML']="<h1>Book in the Bible Search</h1></code>


To change chapter title or edit config:

   1. Go to example.com/data
   2. Edit the file config.inc.php


Bible text; includes all verses:

   1. Go to example.com/bibles/kjv.csv
